abstract.t: The NETCONF Event Notifications standard specifies the mechanism bywhich NETCONF clients can subscribe to and receive eventnotifications. However, with the exception of a timestamp, nostandard Notification content was defined. This memo defines a setof information that should be included in all NETCONF notifications,information that should be included based on class of notificationand also defines a set of specific notifications to support specificmanagement functions, such as configuration.
